IEEE Draft Recommended Practice for Functional Testing of a Communications-Based Train Control (CBTC) System

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This recommended practice establishes a preferred approach for functional testing of a communications-based train control (CBTC) system, based on the CBTC system design and functional allocations as defined in IEEE Std 1474.3.
